1.content: Choose which universe FT will go through. There are many choices, and at either time, FT can be the predator or the prey. It's all up to you! What will happen to the dragon? It's time to choose! By the way, you can chose to follow someone else besides FT, but they have to either eat or be eaten by FT sometime in the story.
1.title: Choose a Universe

11.content: This universe contains a cute, vorish little couple. A blue kitty named Bajiir, and his dominate digimon mate Agumon. Agumon and FT tend to have battles to determine who is the best predator, and so far, FT has lost every time. Bajiir likes to be eaten as well, and often ends up on FT's plate, but FT also is on Bajiir's menu. Who will you choose? The blue kitty, or the digimon? Or maybe FT?
11.title: Bajiir and Agumon

choices: Bajiir and Agumon decide to go out and have fun, with sexy results
111.content:
Bajiir yawns, and murrrrs as he slowly stretches, waking up after a good night's sleep. He sighs, slowly turning over in bed, to smile at the utter love of his life. Agumon, who is still laying on his side, fast asleep. Bajiir giggles, and looks down at his belly, pleased to see that it's round, and sexilly plump as it always is. There is absolutely no sign of the bulges made by his dinner last night, a creature that Bajiir thinks is VERY lucky.
Bajiir has known Agumon for a while now, but only relatively recently have they become full fledged mates. They have enjoyed all kinds of things together, though Agumon is almost always the dominant one in the relationship. Bajiir loves that though, he loves to snuggle, worship, and please his wonderful mate. He knows that although Agumon is dominating and predatory, he's also loving, and knows how to treat his mate.
Bajiir has been eaten by Agumon many times before, and been fully digested alive... An experience he finds to be quite, enjoyable, and arousing, even if it's agonizing and slow. He has always been reformed, though, Bajiir knows that when his time to go comes, he would MUCH desire it to be in the belly of his beloved Agumon. Of course, since everytime he is eaten his reformation is decided by Agumon, that day may come sooner or later then Bajiir might think.
Bajiir beams and leans close, to give his mate a loving slurp, and reaches down to stroke over his sexy, plump, smooth belly.

Agumon murrrrrs, then suddenly belches in Bajiir's face, making him smell the putrid, fresh scent of digested flesh and the many other scents found in a predator's belly. He murrrs, and stretches as he himself slowly wakes up. He opens his eyes, and smiles at Bajiir.
111.title: Joining the vorish lovebirds

choices: Agumon decides to take Bajiir to the bathroom, and show him the bunny's rema
Agumon has other fun, sexy, playful ideas in mind for his Baj
1111.content:
Agumon murrrrs and gives Bajiir a naughty, lusty smirk that Bajiir has come to know well.
Bajiir giggles, and gives his mate another loving kiss, "Mmmmm, it looks to me like you're feeling, eager for something my Agu? I wonder what it could be?"
Agumon simply grins, and murrrs as he slides himself over his mate, until he's sitting on his stomach. He leans back, proudly showing off his plump, well formed, sexy orange belly to Bajiir. He murrrs some, and strokes it over, as it makes a loud, ravenous, greedy gurgle. "Mmmmm, oh I am feeling STARVED! I am so hungry and empty right now... and well, you always look soooo delicious..." He murrrrs, making a very naughty, dirty smirk as he looks down at Bajiir. He slurps his chops, and murrrs softly, as he scoots himself closer, then settles back again, rubbing his warm, plump rear against Bajiir's chest, letting him feel the warm, scaled backside; a part of his body that he knows Baj can't ever EVER get enough of... Not to mention many other parts as well.
Bajiir moans, and trembles softly, already starting to feel quite aroused indeed, staring up at his mate, loving the position he's been put in, and, the sexy things his lover is starting to say. "Ohhhh, but, you ate that BIG rabbit last night! That was enough to feed two preds! How can you be hungry already? How can you have digested him away, and made his life, not even worth a whole day's feeding?"
Agumon makes a dirty smirk, and chuckles, as he strokes over his belly, "Mmmm, I will admit, that Bunny felt gooooood in me... He struggled, thrashed, kicked, squirmed, and pleaded soooo wonderfully... Mmm, I loved his terror as I sloooowly digested him alive, feeling him slowly melt in me... And don't pretend you didn't too, you LOVED listening to his grisly demise in my belly, and putting yourself in his place... And you LOVE that he's all gone now, and that I am hungry again..."
Bajiir murrrs, and trembles eagerly, staring up at Agumon, "Ohhhh, maybe I did... But, that doesn't mean I wanna get eaten!" He beams, knowing that Agumon will enjoy teasing and toying with him, and, having some fun before the feast...
Agumon smirks, and chuckles softly, looking down at Bajiir, slurping over his white teeth in a naughty, lewd way. He murrrs softly, looking thoughtful over just what he wants to do with his coming breakfast, what ways he'll want to play with him before he eats him ALL up.
1111.title: Agumon starts his breakfast fun

choices: Agumon shares the fun, naughty ideas he has in mind
11112.content: Agumon murrrrs and smirks a little, leaning down, to slurp over Bajiir's face, leaving behind a thick, sticky trail of his saliva, and a very brief look into his toothy, hungry jaws. He murrrs, and nuzzles his stomach into him, "Mmmm, oh don't worry my breakfast, I have plenty of fun ideas for what I can do with a tasty little treat like yourself... First, I am going to..."
11112.title: Agumon starts his move

choices: FT agrees, and they start their spar
FT decides to put himself up for Agumon's breakfast willingly today
111122.content:
"Good morning guys! I heard you two having fun last night... Heck, I think the whole SHIP heard you two having fun!"
Agumon irks, and sighs, as he sits back on Bajiir's chest, turning to look over at FT, looking a bit irked at being interupted in his breakfast entertainment.... Afterall, EVERY predator should get to play with his food before he eats it alive! "Yeah, well, you know us FT, we're always eager to have our fun... I heard you and Fox having fun as well you know..."
FT smirks, looking Agu and Bajiir over, knowing that they were preparing for breakfast, and also, that a hungry Agumon is the best Agumon to battle with. He won't publically admit it, though both Agumon and Bajiir know, he really enjoys loosing to Agumon, and being eaten up by him... Though he certainly wouldn't complain about eating him one day! "Well, Fox is the ship's slut... So of course he's full of energy, and needs his big dragon to tap it! So, what were you two up to?"
Bajiir, who has spent this entire time staring at Agumon's belly, a somewhat worshipful, eager look in his eyes, speaks up, "Oh, just this and that... you know.." He murrrs, and leans up, giving Agumon's belly a firm, loving kiss, snuggling into it, and moaning soflty, as he hears the ravenous, hungry gurgles from inside... As well as the clunks of a few bones shifting around inside of him. Either bones lodged in his innards, or the bones of that lucky bunny, Bajiir can't tell which... But he loves the noise either way, it's the sound of a healthy predator's belly!
FT chuckles, "Well, if you two aren't up to much, maybe I should show Agumon that, in the morning, I am full of enough energy to beat him!"
Agumon sighs, not so much beause he dislikes defeating and feasting on FT, but more because he was looking forward to actually playing with his food, and playing with his Baj AS food in particular... He looks at FT, then slides off of Bajiir, smiling at his moan of pleasure from feeling his rump slide along his body. He giggles, and rubs over his stomach where Baj kissed it, having much enjoyed that... He always loves how much love his mate shows him, and, how eager he always seems to be to do things with him... He smirks at FT, "So, shall we then?"
111122.title: FT makes three

choices: Agumon plays with FT, and enjoys a great breakfast
1111222.content:
FT smirks a little, and chuckles, "Well, today I think that I'll go easy on you... and let you simply make me your breakfast... I know you love scaley food in your scaley gut!" He grins, as he reaches around the door frame, and produces a large platter; demonstrating that he had been planning this. He lays it on the ground, then slowly lays himself on it, pulling his legs close, and putting his arms next to it, looking a lot like a tied up meal, without the ropes or apple. He beams up at Agumon, "Don't I look simply delicious? Don't you want to cook me up and gobble me down?" He mmms and chuckles a little, feeling himself become aroused over this, eager to get eaten alive by Agumon, again!
Bajiir sighs a little, as he sits up on the bed, putting his chin in his paw, watching this, feeling a little left out. Lately it's felt like FT gets eaten by his Agumon a whole lot more then he does, and gets to do more with him... He doesn't want to be a controlling mate, but he still can't help feeling a touch jealous. But for now, he sits there, watching his beloved Agu, knowing he'll enjoy this breakfast a lot.
Agu smirks a little, and slurps over his lips, drool starting to drip from the corners of his mouth. "Mmmm, you do look delicous... Heh, maybe, I'll take you to the kitchen, and get some breakfast in my belly... Hmmm, I am not too sure what to cook you up for though...." He smirks, reaching down, plucking the platter up, shoving FT's face into his belly, giggling as he starts walking along, letting the dragon listen to the ravenous gurgles from inside of his body, demanding meat, whoever's it is!
He arrives in the kitchen, and smirks a little, "Hmmm, maybe I'll fry you up, make you dragon bacon!" He murrrrrs hungrilly to himself, more drool starting to slide from his lips, as he pulls out a frying pan, and gets it all ready for his breakfast, putting it on the stove, and turning it on. He smirks down at FT, and rubs over his belly, "Mmmm, soon, you'll be in here you know... And I'm gonna digest you away, and use your body to nourish and pleasure myself..." he winks, "and maybe someday, it'll be permanent, and you'll get to stay as part of me... Though, for now, I can eat you, then let you go back to your unsuspecting fox lover..." He smirks, as he picks FT up, and places him in the frying pan, slurping his chops, as he listens to the sounds of his body starting to fry up deliciously, starting to get cooked up and prepared for his meal. He rubs his belly, feeling even more hungry now for this... Even more eager to fill himself up and enjoy his good breakfast.
1111222.title: FT, it's for breakfast!

choices: Agumon decides to sit there and let his meal digest alive
Agumon leaves the breakfast, to rejoin Bajiir, or go somewhere else
11112221.content:
Agumon murrrs, smirking down at his FT breakfast, stroking his stomach a little, leaning down to take a deep, heady sniff of his delicious, frying scent. He murrrrs, and smiles at him happilly, some drool dribbling onto him. "Mmmm, heh heh, well, I'd say you're about ready... Soon, you'll be safely in me!" He murrrs, and chuckles some, as he slurps over FT's head, then picks him up, and plops him down on the platter again. He carries him over to the table, and sets him down, smirking some, as he puts a bib on himself, sporting a picture of his favorite meal, Bajiir, on a plate, looking delicious and sexy. He murrrs, and reaches down, picking up FT, slurping his chops hungrilly, "Mmmmm, you ready to go into me?" he chuckles, and before FT can even respond, he opens up wide, and starts sliding him into his hungry, drooling, warm jaws, murrrring as he rubs his tongue over his body, tasting him, savoring his delicious flavor, and sighing to himself as he enjoys this. He purrrrs, slowly tilting his head back, smiling a little, rubbing over his tasty meal, as he makes a deep, ravenous gulp, sighing to himself, as FT's head starts sliding into his gullet...
In his jaws, FT looks around, and can see those sharp, white, drool glistening fangs all around him, some with bits of old prey and old food stuck between them, and in the back, he can see his dark, hungry, pulsating gullet. He murrrrs to himself, and then moans as he feels his tongue push hard, and start gulping, forcing him into Agumon's gullet, as Agumon starts enjoying his breakfast, eagerly, quickly, and greedilly feasting on his meal.
Agumon murrrs, rubbing over his stomach, smiling to himself as he keeps gulping and swallowing hungrilly, eager to have his meal slide into his stomach. He slurps over his chest, his stomach, his flavorful groin, his legs, and then, he tilts his head back until his throat is vertical, and moans, making a DEEP gulp, sighing, as his meal slides down, and slowly curls up inside of his hungry, now stuffed belly. He murrrrs happilly and rubs over his stomach, chuckling a little to himself, as he massages his belly, pushes into it, probing and feeling at his tasty prey within there, eager to feel his struggles, and to slowly digest him alive... He murrrrs, and lets out a thick, contented belch, chuckling some, wondering if he should sit here, and enjoy his meal, digest him away, and toy with him. Or, if he should go do something else, go rejoin Bajiir perhaps?
11112221.title: FT slides into Agumon

choices: Someone else...or is that another universe I see?
12.content: FT, the StarFox team's tailgunner and sniper. He often dines on Fox McCloud and Krystal, but also snacks on Falco when in the mood. Since he's a pred in this universe, that's how the team sees him. But who knows? Maybe something happens that turns them against FT and the sight of him makes their mouths water and stomachs growl? It's all up to you! Now choose a character!
12.title: The StarFox Universe

124.content: You've chosen to be Falco, Fox's First mate so to speak. Your a bit stubborn, but your a good friend at heart. You've become used to FT devouring you from time to time, so much its become a natural habit. But you've grown a bit jelous at Fox and Crystal for getting in that belly a bit more. Maybe You'd like some revenge, or maybe you'd like another round. Which one?
124.title: You're Falco

choices: FT walking back to his room
FT sitting at the Dinner table
1241.content:
You sit in your bedroom, sighing to yourself. You feel quite bored. Nothing to do really as you lay on your bed and sigh. Soon you hear FT down the hall talking and laughing to Fox. Soon thoughts of FT rush through your head. How many times he's eaten you compared to Fox and Crystal get you mad.

Soon you feel your belly grumble hungrily and you smile. "Maybe I should go pay our buddy FT a visit." You snicker as you think of revenge in a way.

You walk out of your room to see...
1241.title: Falco's hungry for revenge

choices: FT staring right at you and smirking
12411.content:
You look out to see FT walking back to his room, opening his door and closing it behind him. YOur stomach growls with each hungry thought you get of FT being inside you.

Slowly you sneak down the hallway and open FT's door, very slowly. You don't wanna let FT know your here yet.

You walk into the room slowly, finding magazines and a few guns on the floor. The room is a bit messy, but considering what goes on in his room about every day, its no real big surprise.

You look over at the bed to see...
12411.title: Sneaking into FT's Bedroom

choices: His body looks too good. Eat this lizard already!
Why not have a little fun first?
124111.content:
A sly grin curved along Falco's beak. His soon-to-be meal was resting against his side, snoozing softly and unaware of the hungry avian's presence. Falco quietly stooped across the room, avoiding the scattered objects along the flooring before he halted in front of FT's bedside. Eying the green dragon's succulent body, Falco couldn't help himself but lick his beaked mouth, occasionally letting a strand of drool drip down to the bed. FT couldn't have provided an easier and better meal for Falco.

The green dragon laid atop the blankets of the his bed with most of his clothing taken off. Boxers were the only thing to conceal any part of his scaled body, that appeared to by lightly hot. Falco guessed the sleeping dragon had been to hot for clothing or bedsheets, however he wouldn't complain. This allowed the salivating bird more room to taste his meal's true flavor and scaled hide. Falco stared deeply at the sleeping dragon, watching him lightly twitch every so often from a plausible dream he was experiencing.

He chuckled and dared to placed a feathery hand along the dragon's thigh. FT's warm emerald scales roused Falco from the smooth touch, forcing him to rub along the reptile's calf softly. FT smiled in his droozy dream state, clinging to the mattress tightly as he mumbled gibberish words. Falco retreated his hand away, certain to not awaken the sleeping dragon. He had wasted enough admiring his food's tone form. He had a dragon to gobble up! Although, something held Falco back in eating FT right on the spot. Resist as he might, he couldn't stop gazing towards the dragon's chest, lazily rising and deflating from each deep breath, as his rested against his lined belly. Below his abdomen lye his savory rump, rounding out to stretch his sexy little scaled legs and ending with his bare feet. FT's tail slowly scoots along the bed, sweeping happily as the reptile releases slow groans of nourishment.

Falco felt his face grow hot from the sight as a common feeling began to poke between his legs. He could either swallow this delicious looking dragon now, or play around with it for awhile, and in turn, eating it then. Sweat began to bead under the feather's of Falco's forehead as he endeavored to come up with the right plan.
124111.title: Sleeping Meal

choices: FT is only dragged in deeper! Falco gets his dinner!
FT slides himself back out! Uh-oh!
1241111.content:
Falco's tongue practically blossomed from his mouth, eager to taste the dragon's flavor. His beak nostrils caught a whiff of FT's scent, which was too far to pass off for a single second. This dragon was going down Falco's throat whether he liked it or not.

Placing a knee at the edge of FT's bedside, the avian slid himself onto the mattress at quiet yet brisk pace. He craned his head down to the dragon's scaled feet, slipping out his tongue to give one a quick brush. The sudden flick gave his mouth muscle a delecant flavor that caused Falco to shudder in bliss. His taste was so good, it was impossible not to continue. The feet begin to wiggle slightly as Falco continued his pursuit to lap at them, making sure not go lick too hard or fast to awaken his dinner. FT simply mumbled out moans as he shifted his legs somewhat in response. Falco smiled even more before he purged after FT's body even more.

He scooped the footpaws into his beak, swallowing them down into the slimy tight confines of his esophagus. Six toes squirmed inside the voracious bird's gullet as saliva was quickly slathered over his soles. Falco began to crawl upwards at a tense rate, guiding FT's scaled calves and tail into his drooling maw to guide them down his neck. The dragon continued to weakly smile, chuckling some from whatever dream he was going through.

Falco relentlessly moaned in pleasure. The scaled meat that was working down his body was utterly irresistable, lightly wincing from each lick or swallowing tug. After FT's deliciously plump thighs squeezed into Falco's bloated beak, the bird had arrived at his thick bum. His boxered groin sank leisurely down in Falco's outstretched maw as the tug did its best to drag the scaled mass inward. The lump of flesh probed around the dragon's waste, rimming around familiar bulges that protruded from the lizard's undergarments as FT recoiled in several shifts from the ticklish feeling.

FT slowly began to stir into awakening, scrunching his eyelids as his hands pinched at the bed covers. Falco tensed as the dragon popped his eyes open, groaning out as he lifted his head. "...F-Falco?" FT called out after a long yawn. Falco's eyes widened as he hurried to take in his meal. FT was shocked to have suddenly get shoved back by a small force, causing the reptile to look at his half devoured body. He looked back at Falco in distraught, gritting his teeth together. "Think you could get the slip on me, eh? We'll just see about that!"

Falco suddenly gagged at the feeling of tremendous struggles deep inside his torso. FT had begun to kick his legs wildly while his tail wiggles and thrashed about in a violent manner. The blue bird had just gulped down FT's clothed rump in, however, if he could just get past FT's abdomen, he was certain to gobble this dragon down into his stomach for sure. That would be problematic due to the fact that FT placed his scaled hands around Falco's beak, forcefully pushing against the tough maw to escape.
1241111.title: Falco Devours FT!

choices: Falco decides to force someone to join FT in his belly.
12411111.content:
With his hands tightly hooked over Falco's beak, it certainly gave the bird a difficult time in swallowing FT down. However, FT gasped once he felt feathery hands grip his and pin them against his sides. Falco smirked to the best of his ability with bloated cheeks. The dragon began to whimper as his writhing body continued to descend into Falco's slimy mouth.

FT's curved hips sank down into Falco's bulging neck, laddering down the fleshy slick walls to the bird's growling stomach. He could feel his feet press the bottom of the falcon's stomach, forcing his thriving legs to curl up inside. Hot slime surrounded the green hindpaws and legs, tingling at FT's scaled flesh to rouse a soft yelp to escape his mouth. Falco's confidence overtook him from the sound, persuading him to slurp down FT's lined belly and torso in. The reptilian flavor caused Falco's legs to tremble under the erotic satisfaction. He wanted more.

FT twisted and turned during his trip inward, wriggling at the feeling of Falco's tongue venturing around his chest and arms. The dragon whined out in displeasure, hating that he didn't lock the door before dozing off. He was foolish enough to let Falco make an easy snack out of him. He was supposed to be the top predator amongst the fleet; even far superior to Fox. His shoulders squeeze into the wet maw, as Falco lifts his bulging form upright onto his knees. FT's head vanished with the avian's one, sporting out an excellent lumpy form to sink into the hot sac awaiting him. The dragon slid into the stomach completely, compressed together by the stomach walls as they did their work in tightening around the defeated reptile.

Falco rolled onto his back on FT's bed, cooing in pleasurable happiness as he planted his hands around his newly fat gut. He tugged at the blue feathery sphere, wobbling his stuffed belly to shake his prey about to get his digestive juices to spread over the wriggling reptile.

"How's that for a wake up call? I'm surprised I let you get away with slurping me down so many times. Each time, I was missing out on your meaty scaled body, and I gotta say, it's way better than Fox or Krystal combined." Falco gloated out as he gave his belly another jiggle. The muscles were squeezing FT even tighter as his steamy fluids continued fizz at the emerald dragon's scales. FT felt himself fall back asleep just as before. His constant struggling and tiredness had wiped him out, and continuing his fight would be completely in vain. Falco had won this round, and FT was certain to claim vengeance.

Lying atop the comfy bed, Falco relaxed back with his hands rested around his squelching soft gut, feeling his prey give one more soft kick before fainting away.
12411111.title: FT Goes Down

choices: There's still a chance! Fight him!
124112.content:
FT smirks at the falcon standing in his door way. The grin on his face is wiped clean when FT's teeth poke through his smirk. Falco knows what that means and tries to run, but his legs won't let him, as if he was standing in something like cement or goo. "What are you doing in here, Falco?" FT asked, a growl sound in his voice.

Falco gulped and thought up a lie. "I was...just wondering if Fox was with you. Wanted to...challenge him to a shooting contest."

FT grinned and stood up off the bed. "I'm telepathic, Falco. I know what you were doing. So you thought you'd just waltz on in here and eat me, eh?" FT asked, walking up to Falco with his arms folded.

Falco shivered again and spoke quietly. "You always eat Fox and Krystal more than me..." He choked out.

The dragon continued to smirk. "Fox is my favorite meal, and I eat Krystal for trying to seduce my Fox, which she does all the time."

Falco blinked a bit and listened. "But if you want to be eaten, now would be the time for me to do so!" FT said, placing his claws on Falco's shoulders.

The falcon's eyes widened as FT's jaws began to stretch open.
124112.title: Caught in the act!

choices: "I'm listening. What are these "things" that you speak of?"
"Nah, I'm hungry now!" (FT just eats Falco)
1241121.content:
Falco's eyes stared down the deep throat of FT that was nearly hidden by the rows of sharp dragon teeth and a tongue that was eager to taste the falcon.

Falco squirmed in FT's grip, not wanting to end up as food at this particual momement. His beak opened in shock and he quivered in the powerful dragon's grip. FT's tongue jumped from his mouth and quickly gave Falco a quick lick.

FT moaned from the small sample of Falco's flavor and began drooling even more. Falco knew he was doomed to be FT's food, but he'd rather go down on his own terms. Before FT could begin his meal, Falco shouted at the top of his lungs. "WAIT! Don't do this yet! I want to talk to you, and it's not about being let go!" He proclaimed, hoping it would stop FT.

He did stop. Falco now had chance to request something that might get him in the mood to be eaten. "FT, I don't want to be eaten at this momement because I'm not in the mood for it. However, if you...do somethings to me first, I might jump into the mood and let you eat me." He explained, trying to look into FT's eyes instead of his jaws.

FT thought it over for a second. Falco let out a whimper. Finally, he recieved a response.
1241121.title: A Proposition?

choices: "I plan to fill you with some cream before devouring you"
1241122.content:
Falco stares at FT's lowering drooling jaw and thinks.
Quickly the falcon reacts and knees the dragon in the stomach, releasing FT's grip over him.

Falco backflips from FT's reach and faces him before quickly sliding a foot and knocking FT's footing, sending the large dragon to the floor, FT landing on his rump with a "THUMP!"

Falco quickly closed the door and looked at FT on the floor before walking over to the dragon.

Quickly, Falco grabbed FT and lifted him up, holding him tight

Falco smiled evilly at him.

"Well well..looks like the tables have turned. I always was curious as to what you taste like." He said, his beak already watering with drool.

"Well FT, you're telepathic. Tell me what I'm thinking right now!" He said with a chuckle.


what is Falco thinking...
1241122.title: the Tables turn on FT

choices: Let's see what's behind this door!
13.content: Krashy is a purple-ish shark that met FT after viewing the dragon eating his little brother. Krashy proceeded to then devour FT and has kept him a regular on his diet since. But who knows? Will the meals of FT continue, or will the dragon turn on Krashy and eat him?
13.title: Krashy the Shark

choices: ...Snaps his jaws around part of FT!
131.content:
Krashy glides in the underwater abyss of the vast ocean with watchful eyes. It was time for his daily hunt after all, and he had worked up a voracious appetite for a large piece of prey. His stomach would occasionally remind him of his hunger by large echoes of unsettling gurgles.

Deciding that it would be easy to eat something around his size to fill himself up with, Krashy headed near the coastline of a beach close by to catch an unlucky land animal in the shallows.

Up ahead, Krashy stalked upwards to the near by coastline, lurking in the shallow end. He suddenly spots a familiar looking dragon, swimming playfully. It was none other but the distinct FT the dragon! The anthro reptile float at the surface, basking in the sun and reflecting the beaming sunlight off from his green scales.

Krashy growled to himself in frustration. FT had made a horrible first impression to him, ever since one day when Krashy was swimming with his little brother. Minding his own business with playing with his younger sibling, his brother had been caught in a net by FT and was quickly pulled out of the water. Krashy swam up to the surface and searched for his brother by peeking his head over the water. Mortified, Krashy had to watch his own brother being eaten whole by the anthro dragon.

Sure, his brother reformed after that but ever since that day, there was bad blood between Krashy and FT. They soon formed a rivalry and Krashy has consumed FT ever since that tragic event.

Krashy shook the annoying memory away and quickly went in for his meal.

Krashy darts swiftly through the water, approaching FT and...
131.title: Krashy's Hunt

1312.content:
Expecting him to be unaware of his presence, Krashy's fast pace gains speed as the shark just a few meters away from FT! Suddenly, the dragon turns to notice Krashy, and tugs a rope hidden under the sand! The force of the rope pulls up a well hidden net from within the sand in front of Krashy!

It as too late to avoid the trap, and Krashy flailed in his quick attempt to dodge the net, only to collide into it. The purple shark struggled and writhed within the tight net, only making any chance of escape even more difficult due to him twisting the net into a crowded bundle. FT happily floated over to his catch, humming to himself a joyful tune.

Grabbing the net and heaving it over his back, the dragon simply swims back to shore with and encased Krashy.

"Ergh! Let me out of this thing before I decide to eat you in a more unpleasant way next time, you stupid lizard!" Krashy roared out in rage. He bucked his tail and flared his fins out, but to no avail.

"Oh! You expect me to just release you, even after all the times you've devoured me at beach? I don't even have enough fingers on my hands to start counting off how many times that have happened." Fox closed up the oven and stared inside, licking his lips as he watched parts of FT's body glow from the heat. And after what seemed like hours, Fox finally removed FT from the oven.

Fox carried the steaming dragon over to his dining table, where a large platter awaited to hold FT. Fox placed FT onto the platter and licked his lips, telling FT to open his mouth.

The dragon did as he was told and felt an apple being wedged into his jaws. The hungry vulpine licked his lips as he stared at FT's body, grabbing a salt shaker from the middle of the table.

FT giggled and sneezed as Fox sprinkled the salt over his body, making sure to cover ever part of it. Finally, Fox pulled the platter close, taking a deep sniff of FT's cooked body. FT felt the drool landing on his head and knew Fox was about to eat him.
14322122211.title: Spit Roasted FT

info.brief_description: You control FT the dragon's fate. It's either eat or be eaten!
info.description:
FT the dragon, a powerful predator and a very tasty prey. He knows magic, so it can be useful in either situation. Go through multiple universes and control FT's fate. Will he eat everything in sight? Or will he end up as the dinner to all he meets? You decide!
The Rules:
1) Oral vore only
2) Digestion is allowed
3) Scat is allowed
4) Yiff is allowed (M/M, M/F) No oral, please, nor masturbation. Keep all sexual stuff to anal or vaginal if with a female.
5) Non-fatal cooking is allowed
6) Reformation is recommended
7) Male preds only
8) Have fun!

FT is (C) Me. All other characters (C) their original owners.
For more about FT, visit http://www.furaffinity.net/user/fataltragedy2004
